function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of interoperability between ontologies","Impact":"Inability to support integrative research and data interoperability","Mitigation":"Adopting common standards and principles for ontology development, promoting collaboration and openness","Technologies":"OBO Foundry principles, extensible ontology development strategy","People":"Ontology developers, researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Ontology developers, research institutions, data science organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to align terms under Basic Formal Ontology (BFO)","Impact":"Hindrance in data interoperability and representation of heterogeneous coronavirus knowledge","Mitigation":"Ensuring alignment with BFO, adopting OBO Foundry principles","Technologies":"OBO Foundry principles, BFO","People":"Ontology developers, researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Ontology developers, research institutions, data science organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate representation of coronavirus infectious diseases in CIDO","Impact":"Limitation in representing and annotating coronavirus infectious diseases, hindering data interoperability","Mitigation":"Continuous development and refinement of CIDO, reuse of relevant coronavirus terms from reliable reference ontologies","Technologies":"CIDO ontology, reference ontologies","People":"Ontology developers, researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Ontology developers, research institutions, data science organizations"}]}
